events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to a wrong product delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Please share any photos or details of the product you received and explain why you want a refund.
My order number is 123456789. I received a completely different item than what I ordered.
We apologize for the mistake. We will process your refund immediately and provide a prepaid label to return the wrong product.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the refund process and return label offer.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please ship the incorrect item back using the prepaid label.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and were satisfied with the resolution.
Since we have not heard back and your refund was completed, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our brief survey to rate your support experience.
